verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> vay-Hi happened מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz And it came to pass at the end שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <WH8141> she-na-Ta-yim years יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; of two full וּפַרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> u-far-'Oh that Pharaoh חֹלֵ֔ם <WH2492> cho-Lem, dreamed וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> 'o-Med and behold he stood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> hay-'Or. by the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and lo מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַיְאֹ֗ר <WH2975> hay-'Or, out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <WH5927> 'o-Lot And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> pa-Rot, kine יְפ֥וֹת <WH3303> ye-Fot well מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> mar-'Eh favoured וּבְרִיאֹ֣ת <WH1277> u-ve-ri-'Ot and fat בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> ba-Sar; and they וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> vat-tir-'Ei-nah and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <WH260> ba-'A-chu. in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> She-va' And behold seven פָּר֣וֹת <WH6510> pa-Rot kine אֲחֵר֗וֹת <WH312> a-che-Rot, other עֹל֤וֹת <WH5927> o-Lot came up אַחֲרֵיהֶן֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hen after them מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> hay-'Or, out of the river רָע֥וֹת <WH7451> ra-'ot ill מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> mar-'Eh favoured וְדַקּ֣וֹת <WH1851> ve-dak-Kot dwarf בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> ba-Sar; and they וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֛דְנָה <WH5975> vat-ta-'a-Mo-de-nah and stood אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel by הַפָּר֖וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot the [other] kine עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> se-Fat upon the brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> hay-'Or. of the river

וַתֹּאכַ֣לְנָה <WH398> vat-to-Chal-nah did eat up הַפָּר֗וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot, kine רָע֤וֹת <WH7451> ra-'ot And the ill הַמַּרְאֶה֙ <WH4758> ham-mar-'Eh favoured וְדַקֹּ֣ת <WH1851> ve-dak-Kot dwarf הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> hab-ba-Sar, body אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' the seven הַפָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot, kine יְפֹ֥ת <WH3303> ye-Fot well הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> ham-mar-'Eh favoured וְהַבְּרִיאֹ֑ת <WH1277> ve-hab-be-ri-'Ot; and fat וַיִּיקַ֖ץ <WH3364> vai-yi-Katz awoke פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> par-'Oh. So Pharaoh

וַיִּישָׁ֕ן <WH3462> vai-yi-Shan And he slept וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֖ם <WH2492> vai-ya-cha-Lom and dreamed שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> she-Nit; the second time וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <WH7641> shib-bo-Lim, ears of corn עֹל֛וֹת <WH5927> o-Lot came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> be-ka-Neh stalk אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad upon one בְּרִיא֥וֹת <WH1277> be-ri-'ot rank וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH2896> ve-to-Vot. and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> shib-bo-Lim, ears דַּקּ֖וֹת <WH1851> dak-Kot thin וּשְׁדוּפֹ֣ת <WH7710> u-she-du-Fot and blasted קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> ka-Dim; with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <WH6779> tzo-me-Chot sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hen. after them

וַתִּבְלַ֙עְנָה֙ <WH1104> vat-tiv-La'-nah devoured הַשִּׁבֳּלִ֣ים <WH7641> hash-shib-bo-Lim ears הַדַּקּ֔וֹת <WH1851> had-dak-Kot, And the seven thin אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' the seven הַֽשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> hash-shib-bo-Lim, ears הַבְּרִיא֖וֹת <WH1277> hab-be-ri-'ot rank וְהַמְּלֵא֑וֹת <WH4392> ve-ham-me-le-'ot; and full וַיִּיקַ֥ץ <WH3364> vai-yi-Katz awoke פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold חֲלֽוֹם׃ <WH2472> cha-Lom. and behold [it was] a dream

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> vab-Bo-ker And it came to pass in the morning וַתִּפָּ֣עֶם <WH6470> vat-tip-Pa-'em was troubled רוּח֔וֹ <WH7307> ru-Cho, that his spirit וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach, and he sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for all חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <WH2748> char-tum-Mei for all the magicians מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all חֲכָמֶ֑יהָ <WH2450> cha-cha-Mei-ha; and all the wise men וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <WH5608> vay-sap-Per told פַּרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> par-'Oh thereof and Pharaoh לָהֶם֙ la-Hem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲלֹמ֔וֹ <WH2472> cha-lo-Mo, them his dream וְאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- there פּוֹתֵ֥ר <WH6622> po-Ter but [there was] none that could interpret אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> le-far-'Oh. them unto Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber Then spake שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> sar the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <WH4945> ham-mash-Kim, cupbearer אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲטָאַ֕י <WH2399> cha-ta-'Ai my faults אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I מַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> maz-Kir I do remember הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. this day

פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh Pharaoh קָצַ֣ף <WH7107> ka-Tzaf was wroth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav; with his servants וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and put אֹתִ֜י <WH853> 'o-Ti בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <WH4929> be-mish-Mar, me in ward בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> beit house שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> sar in the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> hat-tab-ba-Chim, of the guard's אֹתִ֕י <WH853> 'o-Ti וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> sar [both] me and the chief הָאֹפִֽים׃ <WH644> ha-'o-Fim. baker

וַנַּֽחַלְמָ֥ה <WH2492> van-na-chal-Mah And we dreamed חֲל֛וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom a dream בְּלַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> be-Lay-lah night אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad in one אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I וָה֑וּא <WH1931> va-Hu; and I אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish each man כְּפִתְר֥וֹן <WH6623> ke-fit-Ron according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <WH2472> cha-lo-Mo of his dream חָלָֽמְנוּ׃ <WH2492> cha-La-me-nu. I and he we dreamed

וְשָׁ֨ם <WH8033> ve-Sham there אִתָּ֜נוּ <WH854> 'it-Ta-nu for נַ֣עַר <WH5288> Na-'ar And [there was] there with us a young man עִבְרִ֗י <WH5680> 'iv-Ri, an Hebrew עֶ֚בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved servant לְשַׂ֣ר <WH8269> le-Sar to the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> hat-tab-ba-Chim, of the guard וַנְּ֨סַפֶּר־ <WH5608> van-Ne-sap-per- and we told ל֔וֹ lo, וַיִּפְתָּר־ <WH6622> vai-yif-tor- him and he interpreted לָ֖נוּ La-nu אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲלֹמֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH2472> cha-lo-mo-Tei-nu; to us our dreams אִ֥ישׁ <WH582> 'ish according כַּחֲלֹמ֖וֹ <WH2472> ka-cha-lo-Mo according to his dream פָּתָֽר׃ <WH6622> pa-Tar. he did interpret

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi happened כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he פָּֽתַר־ <WH6622> pa-tar- And it came to pass as he interpreted לָ֖נוּ La-nu כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken so הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> ha-Yah; happened אֹתִ֛י <WH853> 'o-Ti הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> he-Shiv to us so it was me he restored עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in כַּנִּ֖י <WH3653> kan-Ni unto mine office וְאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> ve-'o-To תָלָֽה׃ <WH8518> ta-Lah. and him he hanged

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> par-'Oh Then Pharaoh וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, Joseph וַיְרִיצֻ֖הוּ <WH7323> vay-ri-Tzu-hu and they brought him hastily מִן־ <WH4480> min- out הַבּ֑וֹר <WH953> hab-Bor; out of the dungeon וַיְגַלַּח֙ <WH1548> vay-gal-Lach and he shaved וַיְחַלֵּ֣ף <WH2498> vay-chal-Lef [himself] and changed שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <WH8071> sim-lo-Tav, his raiment וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came in אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> par-'Oh. unto Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, unto Joseph חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom a dream חָלַ֔מְתִּי <WH2492> cha-Lam-ti, I have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <WH6622> u-fo-Ter and [there is] none that can interpret אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein no אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I שָׁמַ֤עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti it and I have heard עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, say תִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> tish-Ma' of thee [that] thou canst understand חֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom a dream לִפְתֹּ֥ר <WH6622> lif-Tor to interpret אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered יוֹסֵ֧ף <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> par-'Oh Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> le-Mor saying בִּלְעָדָ֑י <WH1107> bil-'a-Dai; [It is] not in me אֱלֹהִ֕ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God יַעֲנֶ֖ה <WH6030> ya-'a-Neh an answer אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> she-Lom of peace פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> par-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yo-Sef; unto Joseph בַּחֲלֹמִ֕י <WH2472> ba-cha-lo-Mi In my dream הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> 'o-Med behold I stood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> se-Fat upon the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> hay-'Or. of the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מִן־ <WH4480> min- out הַיְאֹ֗ר <WH2975> hay-'Or, out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <WH5927> 'o-Lot And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> pa-Rot, kine בְּרִיא֥וֹת <WH1277> be-ri-'ot fat בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> ba-Sar body וִיפֹ֣ת <WH3303> vi-Fot and well תֹּ֑אַר <WH8389> To-'ar; favoured וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> vat-tir-'Ei-nah and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <WH260> ba-'A-chu. in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh Lo שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> she-va'- And behold seven פָּר֤וֹת <WH6510> pa-Rot kine אֲחֵרוֹת֙ <WH312> a-che-roT other עֹל֣וֹת <WH5927> o-Lot came up אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hen, after them דַּלּ֨וֹת <WH1803> dal-Lot poor וְרָע֥וֹת <WH7451> ve-ra-'ot ill תֹּ֛אַר <WH8389> To-'ar favoured מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> me-'Od and very וְרַקּ֣וֹת <WH7534> ve-rak-Kot thin בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> ba-Sar; I לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- as I never רָאִ֧יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti saw כָהֵ֛נָּה <WH2007> cha-Hen-nah such בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz in all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לָרֹֽעַ׃ <WH7455> la-Ro-a'. for badness

וַתֹּאכַ֙לְנָה֙ <WH398> vat-to-Chal-nah did eat up הַפָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot, kine הָרַקּ֖וֹת <WH7534> ha-rak-Kot And the lean וְהָרָע֑וֹת <WH7451> ve-ha-ra-'ot; and the ill favoured אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven הַפָּר֛וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot kine הָרִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Not the first הַבְּרִיאֹֽת׃ <WH1277> hab-be-ri-'Ot. fat

וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <WH935> vat-ta-Vo-nah abide אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about קִרְבֶּ֗נָה <WH7130> kir-Be-nah, among וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo could נוֹדַע֙ <WH3045> no-Da' it could not be known כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for בָ֣אוּ <WH935> Va-'u abide אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about קִרְבֶּ֔נָה <WH7130> kir-Be-nah, among וּמַרְאֵיהֶ֣ן <WH4758> u-mar-'ei-Hen but they [were] still רַ֔ע <WH7451> Ra', ill favoured כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher as בַּתְּחִלָּ֑ה <WH8462> bat-te-chil-Lah; as at the beginning וָאִיקָֽץ׃ <WH3364> va-'i-Katz. So I awoke

וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re And I saw בַּחֲלֹמִ֑י <WH2472> ba-cha-lo-Mi; in my dream וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <WH7641> shib-bo-Lim, ears עֹלֹ֛ת <WH5927> 'o-Lot came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> be-ka-Neh stalk אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad in one מְלֵאֹ֥ת <WH4392> me-le-'Ot full וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH2896> ve-to-Vot. and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and lo שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> shib-bo-Lim, ears צְנֻמ֥וֹת <WH6798> tze-nu-Mot withered דַּקּ֖וֹת <WH1851> dak-Kot thin שְׁדֻפ֣וֹת <WH7710> she-du-Fot [and] blasted קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> ka-Dim; with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <WH6779> tzo-me-Chot sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after them
